content: st before last wrapped st w&t this pattern is property of justyna lorkowska it is copyrighted and is for short row 4 ws p to 1 st before wrapped st w&t personal and non-profit use only this means you can knit for yourself repeat short row 3&4 six eight more times for a gift or for charity you may not sell a neckwarmer made from this resume knitting in the round rs knit to 1st wrapped st pm work pattern you may not reproduce this pattern on or distribute it from a through the left front edge by picking up each wrap and knitting it website this pattern may not be translated reproduced or circulated in together with the st it was wrapped around rem m k to bor removing another language downloading or printing the pattern constitutes markers as you come to them agreement within these terms thank you and enjoy your spring next round p to m rem m work through the right front edge by picking neckwarmer justyna lorkowska toruń poland december 2022 up each wrap and purling it together with the st it was wrapped around pm purl to end hem round 1 k to 1 st before m kfb sm k to m sm kfb k to end 2 sts increase round 2 purl around repeat rnds 1&2 once then round 1 once more 148 176 sts in the next round bobble all sts loosely purlwise finishing cut yarn weave in all ends block lightly making sure to even out the garter hem so it doesn t curl slip it on your favorite young one to keep away the chill contact & support email support@justynaknits com website - http //www justynaknits com ravelry id - lete ravelry group - lete s knits spring neckwarmer by justyna lorkowska - lete s knits c 2012/2022 all rights reserved for personal use only
